isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - REAR COVER, FLYWHEEL, and POWER STEERING GEAR DRIVE - Removal - Flywheel and Rear Cover

svcproc.title: Flywheel and Rear Cover
svcproc.para: Inspect for cracking around webbing and bolt holes. Inspect flywheel for cracks, heat checks, and extensive scoring. These conditions would make it unfit for further service. Replace as required.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, check runout of flywheel surface to ensure correct alignment of engine to transmission. Failure to ensure correct bore concentricity and face runout may reduce life of clutch or transmission.

step1.para: Check for ring gear damage associated with the starter pinion.

note.para: Keep the crankshaft end play at zero in the same direction for all measurements.

step1.para: Check flywheel surface runout as follows:

step2.para: Attach Dial Indicator with Magnetic Base to rear cover. Place indicator tip against surface of flywheel.
Rotate crankshaft slowly. Record total indicator variation .

step1.para: Check rear cover face runout as follows:

note.para: Keep the crankshaft end play at zero in the same direction for all measurements.

step2.para: Attach Dial Indicator with Magnetic Base to surface of flywheel. Place indicator tip against rear cover.
Measure at four points 90° apart for total face variation .
